resources.string: This app is created by Horatiu Lazu, a student at the University of Waterloo pursuing a degree in Computer Science. The purpose of this app is to allow players to enjoy the classic puzzle game of decanting, which involves players manipulating jugs of water to output a specific quantity. The solver engine was created using a top-down breadth-first-search algorithm that caches states to ensure performance. If you have questions regarding the product, contact me at horatiulazu@gmail.com
